title: en jAN uDambennum
sahitya:
en jAN uDambennum kuTumbam adil ettanai Ayiram iDumbai shivanE


anupallavi

  peN jAtiyAm mAnasi avaL periya paDu rAkSasi ayyA


caraNam 1    aimpulak-kadavai uDaittE en arivinaik-koLLai aDittE
vambu sheyyum sEigaL en vAyaip-piDungum pEigaL ayyE
    caraNam 2    Attira suTrattAr nAttika vAdigaL Alai suruTTiDum ASADabhUtigaL
kAttaruL kali tIrttaruL en kalakkm tIrak-karuNai pUttaruL
